meanings.definition: Emitting light as a result of being heated
meanings.sent1: The incandescing light bulb brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The incandescing stars illuminated the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The incandescing campfire made the marshmallows look like tiny suns.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was incandescing, lighting up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The incandescing lava flowed down the volcano, painting the landscape in fiery hues.

meanings.definition: Becoming white or glowing with heat
meanings.sent1: The incandescing metal rod turned bright red in the fire.
meanings.sent2: The incandescing coals of the barbecue grill signaled it was ready.
meanings.sent3: The incandescing toaster made the bread pop up golden brown.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were incandescing with embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The incandescing sun slowly dipped below the horizon, casting a warm glow over the land.
